darkhistory.electrons.ics.ics_engloss_spectrum¶

Nonrelativistic ICS spectrum after integrating over CMB.

Functions

engloss_spec(eleckineng, delta, T[, …]) Energy loss ICS spectrum.
engloss_spec_diff(eleckineng, delta, T[, …]) Nonrelativistic ICS energy loss spectrum by beta expansion.
engloss_spec_series(eleckineng, delta, T[, …]) Nonrelativistic ICS energy loss spectrum using the series method.
